DOC.brief_summary: Anti-Müllerian hormone ( AMH ) , also know Müllerian inhibiting substance , dimeric glycoprotein belongs transform growth factor-beta family . It involve regression Müllerian ducts male fetal development . In female , AMH solely produce granulosa cell preantral small antral follicle , regulate ovarian activity follicular steroidogenesis
DOC.brief_title: Correlation Between Serum Anti-Müllerian Hormone & Müllerian Ducts Anomalies Infertility
DOC.detailed_description: Following approval internal review board Egyptian IVF-ET center , retrospective analysis undertaken detailed review patient file underwent intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) trial start January 2010 till January 2015 do . Patients diagnose mullerian anomaly name , age , duration infertility , serum FSH , LH , & AMH level record . The method diagnosis ( HSG , 3D/ultrasonography , hysteroscopy , laparoscopy ) also document .
DOC.criteria: woman diagnose mullerian anomlies whether clinically image previous ovarian surgery ovarian drilling polycystic ovarian syndrome ( PCOs ) .
